channel.title: Help please?
channel.description:
Well, I am new to the whole running a server business..I downloaded Testscape, fixed the errors etc.. and got my server running. My first order of business was to make myself owner, so I went into client Java and searched "if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")" bla bla bla and made myself owner. Then I saved, compiled, and ran my server, but no changes were made. I have found that this has happened with every code I add, and I am at a loss as to why. Any help regarding this issue would be muchly appreaciated
Thanks.

i got a prob with my compiler also it says u do not have jdk 5.0. or 6.0. tho i have the latest updates of jdk
[/quote]
find another source with a diff compiler then paste it into your source instead of taharoks his sucks now-a-days its outdated use silabsoft compiler or some other non-tahrok compiler lol[/quote]

item.title: Help please?
item.dc:creator: @televator0 televator0
item.description:
@televator0 wrote:

Ok, here you go.

N0vaScape V2: New Release!
there is a simple problem if ur a n00b and dont know it ill have to tell u how to fix it 4 rs cash or u wilkl have to read up on java

Heres the features (I have put on everything from TestScape and Project 16 and more!!!):
TESTSCAPE SOURCE

-Removed Slayer skill (sorry)
-No longer train on dummy’s doors and hay (drastically reduced their xp)
-Increased xp gained from combat
-Monster drops are changed.
-Alot more, (xero wouldnt even recognize it HA! Love you xero!)
-ADDITIONS-
-More Drops for npc’s!
-Tons of commands.
-ADDED ALOT OF HALF ASSED SKILLS.
-A help menu for almost every stat.( click the stat icon )
-Fletching (half assed)
-DRAGON SMITHING + GILDED SMITHING
-Crafting, herblore, farming, and more skills all half assed, but their there.
-KBD attacks with Fire breath
-Low Alch
-High Alch
-Enhance ALL jewelry
-Superheat Item
-Magic on players in wilderness(Emotes + Correct Damge and GFX)
-Face NPC when Attacking
-Face NPC when Maging
-Face NPC when Pickpocketing
-Face Object when Clicking/Using
-Couple new commands
-Switch between magics and ancients
-Worshiping
-Alignments
-Full Pickpocketing with GFX and Emotes
-Stat bugs FIXED
-New interface commands(testing purposes)
-Full Demon attack emotes!
-Guthan set effect
-Ancient spells (All for npcs, Ice and Shadow barrage for pking)
-Ancient Teleports
-FULL MAGIC ON PLAYER(Pking and CastleWars!)
-Lots of weapon emotes
-New items in shops
-AutoSave! (Saves EVERYONES account every 100 seconds)
-Fixed Potions (Thanks Drags for all your help, Pots work now)
-Set effects for the 3 melee barrow brothers
-New method for magic (doesnt crash anymore)
-Fixed some item slots
-Fixed Device(cannon) makes you fly!
-Complete help Menu
-Easy Teleport to CastleWars and Wilderness
-Base Ability for Summon
-More NPC’s including Tzhaar npcs
-Shops and banks for Tzhaar
-Ojbects for Tzhaar
-Gnome Agility Course
-Max for stats raised to 135
-Jad cave with intense training and tons of NPCs
-TzHaar mages attack with flames
-Lose Items When Die
-Added some new items like:
*-Fire Cape
*-Dragon 2H
*-Obby Cape
*-Full Infinity
*-Fury Amulate
*-Mage Book
*-Dragon Hatchet
-Teleport a player to you
-Teleport to a player
-Teleports now 100%!
-Ancient Teleports now 100%!
-Fixed Global drops and full pickup method!
-Fixed Multi Ice and Shadow Barrages!
-Completly redid magic…again…
-Fixed HitPoint Bug
-Fixed NPC Spawns
-Put a timer Pking Ice Barrages
-Added Temp Player look
-Added loads of npcs
-Added support for New NPCs + Areas
-Added Dungeons, Guilds, Shops
-ALL BUGS FIXED! (No more crashes!)
-Added Retribution Prayer(it actually works)
-Working ALL Prayers!
-Added Prayer Head Icons!
-Added all Strength Prayers
-Prayer restores over time
-Added Amour Defense Bonuses
-Added Fully Bronze-Dragon Defense bonuses 100%
-Added Barrows + Godly Armor Defense Bonuses
-Added full pickpocketing
-Fixed thieving and woodcutting
-Fixed Magic Projectiles, Lvl reqs, and damages
-Cleaned up a lot of cheezscape
-Disabled most logs to reduce lag ALOT
-Wildy Level
-Dueling + Staking
-Teleblock
-Teleother
-Recoded Autosave, Saves File + Moreinfo File
-Imported All commands from P16
-ADDED HERBLORE + WORKING POTS!
-Fixed all Dragon hide glitches
-Added new npcs and deleted useless ones
-Login bug fixed the right way
-No more player limit on logins
-Fixed Shops
-Arrows for ranged
-Full Ancients
-Multi Barrages now ignore NPCs with 0 Health (thanks fassy)
-Added some Ardy Thieving stalls with lvls and emotes
-Full Barrows!
-Added Summoning the right way
-Dragon BattleAxe Special attack
-Added WorldObject autospawn (thanks Ramen)
-Put in Bolloons are Party Pete’s
-Fixed Dragon Battle Special, energy comes back over time

Please Download

http://www.megaupload.com/?d=VDIG0ESO
http://rapidshare.de/files/37051018/N0vaScape_V2.rar.html

Read full topic

item.title: Help please?
item.dc:creator: @mr_candy mr candy
item.description:
@mr_candy wrote:

ok make sure the fly command looks smug like this [code] addItem(3488,1);
addItem(3485,1);
sendMessage(“Gilded bitch It will 0wn your ass”);
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“fly”) && playerRights >=3)
{
setAnimation(1500);
playerSE = 1501;
playerSEW = 1851;
playerSER = 1851;
playerSEA = 1851;
sendMessage(“Fly! Wee!”);
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
else if(command.startsWith(“char”)) {
showInterface(3559);
}

if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.s[/code] ok the else if is the start and the final “}” before the next else if is the end you want it to look like this not word for word just host it fits perfectly no gaps no missing letters etc

Read full topic

item.title: Help please?
item.dc:creator: @televator0 televator0
item.description:
@televator0 wrote:

If i can just make a suggestion, dont use testscape source and instead use someone elses source from the download section there is a lot of sources to choose from, and there is also updates already on its with the npc’s saying Online/Offline and other stuff all you have to do is edit.

Enjoy,Tele

item.title: Help please?
item.dc:creator: @televator0 televator0
item.description:
@televator0 wrote:

thats not the problem, the problem is first off you must ALSO go into the charactirs file list and click on your name, and look for…(player rights:) type 3 for owner,2 for admin, and 1 for p mod.

and to let you know you must also do the if player name equalrs ("") thing, and to make sure, type in ::pickup 0995 100 and if it works that means your the owner because owners cant see there crown, but there is a tut for that in the tutorial section.

hope it helped you out
Your senior member, Tele

Read full topic
